id.description: The unique identifier for the category.

parent_id.description: The identifier of the parent category, if any.

description.description: A brief description of the category.

views.description: The number of views the category has received.

sort_order.description: The order in which the category is displayed.

page_title.description: The title of the category page.

items.description: A keyword related to the category.

meta_description.description: The meta description for the category.

layout_file.description: The layout file used for displaying the category.

image_url.description: The URL of the category image.

is_visible.description: Indicates whether the category is visible on the storefront.

search_keywords.description: Keywords used for searching the category.

default_product_sort.description: The default sorting option for products within the category.

custom_url.description: Contains information about custom URLs associated with this category.

path.description: The URL path for the category.

is_customized.description: Indicates whether the category URL is customized.
